/wiki/Fernando_Prass: Fernando Büttenbender Prass (born 9 July 1978 in Porto Alegre) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Brazilian side Ceará.
/wiki/Pr%C3%AAmio_Craque_do_Brasileir%C3: The Prêmio Craque do Brasileirão (English: Brasileirão Best Player Award) is an award given by the Brazilian Football Confederation (known as CBF) and Rede Globo for the best players, head coaches, and referees of the Série A.
/wiki/Fagner_Conserva_Lemos: Fagner Conserva Lemos (born 11 June 1989), known simply as Fagner (Brazilian Portuguese: [ˈfagnɛʁ]), is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a right back for Corinthians and the Brazil national team.
/wiki/Anderson_Vital_da_Silva: Anderson Vital da Silva, commonly known as Dedé (Brazilian Portuguese: [dɛˈdɛ]; born 1 July 1988) is a  Brazilian footballer who plays as a centre back for Cruzeiro.
/wiki/2011_Campeonato_Carioca: The 2011 Campeonato Estadual da Serie A de Profissionais do Rio de Janeiro was the 110th edition of the top tier football in Rio de Janeiro. It was organized by the Federação de Futebol do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (FERJ). The competition began January 19 and ended on May 15. Botafago were the title defenders.
/wiki/Anderson_Martins: Anderson Vieira Martins (born 21 August 1987) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for São Paulo FC as a centre-back.
/wiki/R%C3%B4mulo_Borges_Monteiro: Rômulo Borges Monteiro (born 19 September 1990), known simply as Rômulo, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder. He currently plays for Shijiazhuang Ever Bright.
/wiki/Felipe_Jorge_Loureiro: Felipe Jorge Loureiro (born 2 September 1977), known as Felipe, is a Brazilian football coach and former footballer.
/wiki/Diego_de_Souza_Andrade: Diego de Souza Andrade (born 17 June 1985), known as Diego Souza, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder or a forward for Brazilian Série A club Grêmio.
/wiki/Bernardo_Vieira_de_Souza: Bernardo Vieira de Souza, better known as Bernardo (born May 20, 1990) is a Brazilian footballer who plays as attacking midfielder who plays for Volta Redonda.
/wiki/%C3%89der_Lu%C3%ADs: Éder Luís de Oliveira (born 19 April 1985), known simply as Éder Luís, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Guarani.
/wiki/Ricardo_Gomes: Ricardo Gomes Raymundo (born 13 December 1964) is a Brazilian retired professional footballer.
/wiki/Crist%C3%B3v%C3%A3o_Borges: Cristóvão Borges dos Santos (born 9 June 1959), known as Cristóvão Borges or simply Cristóvão, is a Brazilian retired footballer who played as a midfielder, and is the current manager of Atlético Goianiense.
/wiki/2011_CR_Vasco_da_Gama_season: The 2011 season was Club de Regatas Vasco da Gama's 113th year in existence, the club's 96th season in existence of football, and the club's 40th season playing in the Brasileirão Série A, the top flight of Brazilian football, having been out only in 2009, after a relegation from top division in 2008, backing in 2010.
